name: Gun Dog
description:
Gun Dog is here to save the day!

Help this gun-carrying bulldog rescue his friend, kidnapped by the Evil Witch!

Venture through three colorful stages and defeat that Wicked Hag!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • Right Mouse Click to shoot
  • Z to interact with signs and advance dialogue
  • ESC to open the pause menu

Credits:

  • Assets: Kenney (some were edited by me)
  • Icon: Delapouite
  • Music: CodeManu
  • Sound effects: RaoulWB, dklon, freesound (see below)

This videogame uses these sounds from freesound:

"dog_whining 1.wav" by 15GPanskaBokstefflova_Nicola (CC0 1.0)
